roleset.name: (cause to become) the color red

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that is red

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: Often the genteel, conservative, long-term-oriented investment bankers were displaced by crude traders: ``When angered, he cursed so forcefully that his face reddened and his pale-blue eyes narrowed into tiny slits,'' the authors say of Lehman's Lewis Glucksman.

example.name: agentive
example.text: John reddened his cheeks to look younger.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'redden' based on sentences in wsj. Member of VNcls other_cos-45.4.
